# Workplace, Fancy
## Overview
**Size:** 1 ss

**Cost:** 2,000 gp

**Prerequisites:** None

This area resembles the [[Workplace, Basic|basic workplace]], but it has finer (masterwork) tools and equipment. When using the area for the appropriate purpose, it grants a +2 circumstance bonus on appropriate skill check or checks.
